robot.sensors

Class USSensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • robot.sensors.USSensor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class USSensor
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class represents the Ultrasonic sensor, you can order the sensor to continuously sense things or only scan at certain moments.

        public int scan()

      • filterSample

        public static float filterSample(float sample)
        Parameters:
        sample - a sample from the ultrasonic sensor
        Returns:
        the filtered sample, cuts off sample at 30 cm if the sample is greater than 30
